## IStringBufferOutputOptions interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IStringBufferOutputOptions 
```

[normalizeSpecialCharacters?](./terminal.istringbufferoutputoptions.normalizespecialcharacters.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ If set to true, special characters like \\<></>n, \\<></>r, and the \\<></>u001b character in color control tokens will get normalized to \[-n-\], \[-r-\], and \[-x-\] respectively

This option defaults to `true`
